title: If I'd Been Born in Bethlehem
description: 1966. Fourth Impression. Unpaginated. Paperback book with pictorial cover. Contains colour illustrations throughout. Clean pages with mild tanning throughout. Tightly bound with mild thumb-marking throughout. Mild water staining to pages throughout. Paper cover has mild edge wear with mild corner curling. Moderate tanning to spine. Notable scratching and marking to covers. Mild water stains and droplets to covers.
author: Joan Gale Thomas
